author: rhuijben
msg: Convert ra_serfs 'svn_ra_replay' support to the transition based xml parser.
Also improve the memory usage of the driven editor by passing per-node scoped
pools to the editor's 'add_*' and 'open_*' methods.
(replay_state_e): Add new states. Use common prefix.
(replay_node_t): New struct, containing per file/dir state.
(revision_report_t): ... this. Remove per item state and now unused vars.
cdata_replay): Remove functions fold functionality in these...
replay_cdata): New functions. Add more error checking based on the node
(replay_done): New function. Handles magic that was part of the old xml parser.
(create_replay_body): Use passed pool for tempvars instead of long lived ctx.
(svn_ra_serf__replay): Store context on the stack. Use handler->done.
(svn_ra_serf__replay_range): Move variables referenced from contexts to the outer
scope, to show they are used out of scope. Use new parser. Reduce scope of

author: mahadev
msg: AMBARI-2568. Setup LDAP does not validate true/false response. (Dmitry L via mahadev)

author: peter_firmstone
msg: Synchronization fixes relating to LeaseMap implementations.  The LeaseMap interface was originally specified as an unsynchronized Map, however relaxing this requirement allows for some implementations to be synchronized or concurrent.
Updated ClassServer to use Starter interface.
Changed ReadyState to be non blocking when ready.
Fixed unsynchronized access to proxy references in FiddlerImpl.

author: rhuijben
msg: Extend the transition based xml parser in ra_serf with two features:
In multi-request operations as update and replay a success callback
is needed to mark a request as done, and to signal the context loop that
This commit adds the necessary plumbing to provide better error handling
and to support the conversion of the replay handling, which I will add as
(expat_response_handler): Handle expected status. Use slightly safer
